docs.snippet: Smiling faces: A report on the annual Academy Awards lunch....
docs.lead_paragraph: Think of it as carb-loading for the ego marathon. Yestereday, 140 nominees turned up at the annual Academy Awards lunch at the Beverly Hilton. By tradition, everybody is all smiles and good lucks, while plotting and seeking votes behing the curtains. Monica Almeida, a staff photographer for The New York Times, was there and briefed the Bagger on this year's scene.
docs.abstract: Smiling faces: A report on the annual Academy Awards lunch.

docs.snippet: Iranian Abducted in Iraq By Men With Official ID  An Iranian diplomat was abducted when his convoy was stopped in Baghdad by men with official Defense Ministry identification, senior Iraqi and American officials said, raising questions about wheth...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iranian Abducted in Iraq By Men With Official ID An Iranian diplomat was abducted when his convoy was stopped in Baghdad by men with official Defense Ministry identification, senior Iraqi and American officials said, raising questions about whether Iraqi government forces were involved in the abduction. PAGE A8 Apple vs. Apple No Longer Apple Inc., the maker of the iPod, and Apple Corps, the guardian of the Beatles' music interests, have settled their dispute over the use of an apple logo. The agreement raised speculation the Beatles' music may be licensed for download. PAGE C1 Seeing Red, in All Its Colors Natalie Angier looks at the color red, and finds it is not significant to humans alone. BASICS, PAGE F1 Rapid Rise at NBC Universal When Jeff Zucker is, as expected, named the new head of NBC Universal today, he will have completed a spectacular two-decade ascent. BUSINESS DAY, PAGE C1 Flood Brings Fear of Disease At least 29 people have died in flooding in Indonesia's capital, Jakarta, and officials warned about the possible spread of disease. PAGE A11 The Shape of Fall Spectators at Fashion Week in Bryant Park saw fresh ideas from an old master, Oscar de la Renta, and two young ones, Philip Lim and Benjamin Cho. PAGE B7

docs.snippet: Calling all Bagger Irregulars for info. on "Babel's" inclusion in the best film category of the Globes....
docs.lead_paragraph: There's been some backchannel developments re: "Babel" and its inclusion in the best dramatic picture category of the Globes. Stay tuned, or better yet, if you have some first-hand knowledge of how the decision was made to place "Babel" what is an English language category of the awards, e-mail the Bagger (carpetbagger@nytimes.com).
docs.abstract: Calling all Bagger Irregulars for info. on "Babel's" inclusion in the best film category of the Globes.
